meta.title: WhatsApp/SMS — PC Dixon ↔ Ben Carter (Mar 2024–Jun 2025, partial from paste)

entries.speaker: PC Dixon
entries.quote: Initial SMS: statement follow‑up, Instagram reference, GP letter requested to evidence anxiety.

entries.speaker: System
entries.quote: Voice call — 5 min

entries.speaker: System
entries.quote: Voice call — No answer

entries.speaker: System
entries.quote: Silenced voice call (Focus mode)

entries.speaker: System
entries.quote: Voice call — 1 min

entries.speaker: Ben
entries.quote: No phone calls; you were happy to move my case to July on holiday. Weren’t safeguarding me. 17 days no contact. 'Doesn’t cooperate with NICE links'.

entries.speaker: PC Dixon
entries.quote: Case file being built; need GP letter + contact evidence; sent NICE links; GP to provide letter.

entries.speaker: Ben
entries.quote: You said it was always from November, yet you still ask for a July call; now it’s from July.

entries.speaker: PC Dixon
entries.quote: If you have the July call, it would help the case.

entries.speaker: Ben
entries.quote: You told me my suicide was my fault; when did you tell me that, and why?

entries.speaker: PC Dixon
entries.quote: Will continue to finalise case until reassigned; prefer phone conversation.

entries.speaker: PC Dixon
entries.quote: Instagram will not help your mental health; could evidence stalking by you.

entries.speaker: Ben
entries.quote: The pattern now is no reply.

entries.speaker: PC Dixon
entries.quote: Provide GP letter to evidence S4A offence; more links sent.

entries.speaker: PC Dixon
entries.quote: Without evidence you provide, case file cannot be finished.

entries.speaker: Ben
entries.quote: Have I been safeguarded? This is not the law. I allege corruption; you are my suspect.

entries.speaker: PC Dixon
entries.quote: Has 41 cases; prefers calls; texting not fluid.

entries.speaker: Unknown Police Voicemail
entries.quote: …you mentioned you were suicidal… the officer will contact you…

entries.speaker: Ben
entries.quote: Shared drive link: 'Alanna 22‑05‑25 00‑35 accuses me of raping her – VEED (1).mp4'; asks for confirmation it’s been logged.

entries.speaker: PC Dixon
entries.quote: No longer dealing with case; filed and NFA’d; further contact may be considered harassment.

contradiction_links.description: Dixon asks for July call while claiming case starts in November.
User says suicide not logged; police demand GP letter instead of safeguarding.
Officer blocks/mutes; later replies with NFA and harassment warning.
Officer conditions progress on 'NICE links' and GP letter.

legal_mapping: UK GDPR Art. 15 (access to personal data incl. WhatsApp metadata)
ECHR Art. 2 operational duty (suicide risk context)
CPS Code for Crown Prosecutors (disclosure & evidence handling)
